fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Fervor: If you have 1 HP at the start of a phase, draw 2 satcheled cards. 
- Sponsors: Learn an Order role that exists in the game. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Rush: Lose 1 HP. Gain a random non-special attacking card. [Infinite, 2 CD] 
- Charge: Lose 1 HP. Gain a random special attacking card, or non-special attacking card of your choice. [2 uses, 3 CD, Unlocks D2]
- Rest: Heal! yourself. [3 uses, 2 CD]  
- Flex: Draw a random Satcheled card. Gain a use every 3 HP you lose from your abilities. [1 use, Recharging, 0/3]
